thread.title: Great hotel, convenient location
thread.title_full: Great hotel, convenient location - Review of Doubletree by Hilton - London Islington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: shsmith12
title: Great hotel, convenient location
text:
I only stayed here for one night for a business trip, and I wish I could have stayed longer. The hotel is convenient to the Angel tube stop and I had not problems walking from there with my luggage or even to Kings Cross with my luggage when I left.
The room was clean and well appointed, and the breakfast in the executive lounge worked for me. It wasn't the most robust of selections so if you're looking for something along those lines it might not be the best for you.
